COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x110
STRING: Lunch as always.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11c
STRING: And, the same scene as always.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x128
STRING: I was watching Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x134
STRING: I couldn't stop thinking about the day before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x166
STRING: [Chris] “What...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17c
STRING: Chris stared at me with a slightly angry look on his face
as he said that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x192
STRING: Was it even showing on his face?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19e
STRING: With nothing else to do, I answered lightly, like I was
thinking about his search for a partner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b4
STRING: [Torta] “What are you going to do now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d2
STRING: [Chris] “What am I going to do...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x204
STRING: [Chris] “I've just started, so I'm going to look without
rushing it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21a
STRING: [Torta] “Umm... You need to rush things a little.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x238
STRING: [Chris] “I've found some likely candidates.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24e
STRING: [Torta] “Really? That's good, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26c
STRING: [Chris] “Really. So don't worry so much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x282
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah, okay. Well, I'm going home today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a0
STRING: [Chris] “Alright, see you tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c8
STRING: I managed to keep up appearances and walked into the
hallway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d4
STRING: I was fine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e0
STRING: I didn't think I acted any differently than normal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ec
STRING: Chris cheerfully showed me out as if he hadn't noticed
anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x302
STRING: That let me know that what happened yesterday wasn't
a big deal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30e
STRING: It seemed the female student named Falsita Fawcett
didn't tell Chris anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x324
STRING: Of course, if she was going to tell him, she wouldn't
have taken those steps.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33a
STRING: [Torta] “Then... Why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x350
STRING: I couldn't find an answer, but I couldn't ask Chris
directly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35c
STRING: Then I hid in the shadows of the hallway, and waited for
Chris to come out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a6
STRING: Good.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b2
STRING: Chris left before the lunch break was over.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3be
STRING: It was Thursday, the day that the letter from Chris
would arrive.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ca
STRING: And it was also the day I had to send my letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d6
STRING: I had to catch Asino in front of the classroom and talk
to him before lunch, then send the letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f4
STRING: I followed Chris carefully so he wouldn't notice me,
seeing what his plans for the day were.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x40a
STRING: I saw that Chris was planning to search for candidates
in the school today, so I hurried to the First Hall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x456
STRING: I checked the clock and saw it was ten minutes before
the end of the lunch break.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x462
STRING: It was something that would only take five minutes, so
I'd make it if Asino came to Ms. Cordell's classroom five
minutes early.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x482
STRING: Regardless, I couldn't go inside to check, so I would be
at a loss if Asino had arrived before I did.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a2
STRING: I decided just to wait there until five minutes before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ae
STRING: I had to write the letter, so I couldn't wait any longer
than that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f0
STRING: [Asino] “Hey, it's Tortinita.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x506
STRING: A while later, Asino finally showed up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51c
STRING: [Torta] “You're late...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x54e
STRING: [Asino] “For what? I still have five minutes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x564
STRING: [Torta] “Well, alright then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x596
STRING: [Asino] “So? You weren't waiting for me, were you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ac
STRING: [Torta] “Yes, I was.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5de
STRING: [Asino] “Hmm...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f4
STRING: [Torta] “Falsita Fawcett. Do you know that name?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x630
STRING: [Asino] “Yeah... She's a candidate to be my partner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x646
STRING: [Torta] “Wow... That's impressive for you. So, why did
you tell her?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x66e
STRING: [Asino] “That's very frank, as always.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x684
STRING: [Torta] “I don't like beating around the bush. Why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a2
STRING: [Asino] “Because she asked me. About Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6b8
STRING: [Torta] “Why did you tell her?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ea
STRING: [Asino] “Weren't you listening? She asked me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x700
STRING: [Torta] “Don't you remember your promise?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x732
STRING: [Asino] “Don't tell anyone else, right? I remember, but I
didn't say I'd keep it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x752
STRING: [Torta] “I thought that was your promise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x768
STRING: I said that with venom, but the smug boy in front of me
answered, unmoved.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x786
STRING: [Asino] “I just answered, ‘I don't know.’”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x79c
STRING: Three years ago...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a8
STRING: It was true. Asino just answered “I don't know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7b4
STRING: It was plain that it was an answer given in
understanding.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c0
STRING: I thought that it was very much like him to give such an
indirect answer, but... That's how it was, then.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d6
STRING: I still remembered what happened three years before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ea
STRING: Well, I wasn't one to speak poorly of people.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7f6
STRING: [Torta] “What was your reason?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x828
STRING: [Asino] “Tortinita.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x83e
STRING: Asino said my full name without shortening it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x84a
STRING: Coming from him, I felt like it was an insult, but I didn't
want to correct him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x860
STRING: [Torta] “What?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x87e
STRING: [Asino] “It has nothing to do with you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x894
STRING: [Torta] “If it had nothing to do with me, I wouldn't be
here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8b2
STRING: [Asino] “I'm saying that what I said to Fal is none of your
business. Don't make me repeat myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d2
STRING: [Torta] “Fal, huh... Do you like her, then?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x904
STRING: [Asino] “What?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x91a
STRING: [Torta] “You idiot. Do you know why she asked you?
She wants to ask Chris to be her partner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x956
STRING: [Asino] “Yeah, that's right. But it's a problem of musical
chemistry. She may not be a match for Chris. If that
happens, she'll be my partner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x980
STRING: [Torta] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x996
STRING: Was Asino being used?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9aa
STRING: [Asino] “She's going to try performing with lots of
people and then decide. Chris was just one of the
candidates. So am I, of course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d4
STRING: [Torta] “So that's why she asked you about Chris's
secret?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f2
STRING: [Asino] “She didn't ask. It just came up in conversation.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa08
STRING: [Torta] “Was it a fun chat? Did it make her happy?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa30
STRING: [Asino] “What are you trying to say?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa46
STRING: [Torta] “I'm saying that I'm in trouble because of the
subject you chose to talk about to the girl you like. Is
that so hard to understand?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa6e
STRING: [Asino] “Yeah it was. You should brush up on your
language studies.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa8e
STRING: [Torta] “Maybe you should become a man who has
more things to talk about?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaca
STRING: [Asino] “So...? Just what's the problem? Did Fal tell
Chris the truth?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaea
STRING: [Torta] “That's beside the point.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb08
STRING: [Asino] “I made her promise not to. That should be
enough.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb1e
STRING: [Torta] “Then let me check one thing. She didn't ask
you, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb5a
STRING: [Asino] “She said that Chris was a little strange, so I told
her. She asked about a lot of other Fortelle majors, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb84
STRING: [Torta] “I see... Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb9a
STRING: Did that mean she was simply looking for a partner?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xba6
STRING: But if that was the case, she didn't need the umbrella.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc6
STRING: [Asino] “Can I say one more thing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbdc
STRING: [Torta] “Go ahead.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc0e
STRING: [Asino] “What's so great about Chris, anyway? He's so
intense, I can't take it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc2e
STRING: [Torta] “You're his friend, aren't you? Shouldn't you
know better than anyone?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc56
STRING: [Asino] “Tortinita. I'm asking for your reason.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc6c
STRING: [Torta] “It's that he's not like you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc8a
STRING: [Asino] “You're always so cute when it comes to Chris.
It's scary to be embroiled in it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcaa
STRING: [Torta] “So? You're just going to use Chris, Asino?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcdc
STRING: [Asino] “Yeah, friends are there to be used, don't you
know?. He has real ability. I lose nothing being friends
with him. Of course, if I stood to lose, I'd toss him aside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd06
STRING: Asino said this with a wry tone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd26
STRING: He had said the same kind of thing when I first told him
about Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd3c
STRING: But I didn't think he could do that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd48
STRING: He played the sarcastic cynic, but he was mostly a good
person.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd5e
STRING: He was popular, but he was normally arrogant, so he
was the type that wasn't good at relating to people.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd74
STRING: He got along with Chris because Chris was the type to
not care about that, so it wasn't Asino “deigning to be
friends” like he might think.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd94
STRING: [Torta] “Just make sure you don't get tossed aside.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdce
STRING: [Asino] “That's not a funny joke.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdee
STRING: [Torta] “You'll laugh at it. Eventually.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe30
STRING: [Asino] “So... It's time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe46
STRING: [Torta] “See you, Asino Altiele.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe64
STRING: [Asino] “Yeah. Tortinita.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe88
STRING: Asino entered the classroom.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe94
STRING: He would be fine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xea0
STRING: He talked like that, but in the end, he couldn't throw
Chris away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeb6
STRING: That was a weakness of Asino's, but I thought that I'd
leave that to Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xecc
STRING: Regardless, I would go talk to this Fal tomorrow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee2
STRING: Then I'd ask why she came to Chris... No, I knew the
reason.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xef8
STRING: To ask Chris to be her partner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf04
STRING: I wanted to ask why she did something stupid like bring
that umbrella, that's what.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf5a
STRING: [Torta] “I'm home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf8c
STRING: [Ninna] “Oh, welcome home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfb0
STRING: The letter wasn't there yet, so I went to my room on the
second floor.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfde
STRING: Normally the letter arrived around this time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfea
STRING: Then I changed into formal clothes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xffe
STRING: Clothes that Arie wore.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1022
STRING: Wearing those clothes calmed me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x102e
STRING: It was like I became Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x103a
STRING: I could forget about Asino Altiele and about Falsita
Fawcett.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x106a
STRING: Rain fell for the first time in a long time last Sunday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1076
STRING: I wondered how many months it had been.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1082
STRING: I heard that it used to rain often in this city, but it
seldom does now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10b0
STRING: When I went near the window, the smell of rosemary
got stronger.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10bc
STRING: I broke off a piece and brought it to my nose.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10c8
STRING: Maybe I would use that to cook.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10d4
STRING: Or maybe I could make it into some herbal tea and
warm myself up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10e0
STRING: As I contemplated this while gazing out the window, I
saw someone come to the mailbox on the first floor.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10f6
STRING: It was the mailman.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1102
STRING: Today was the day Chris's letter would arrive.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x110e
STRING: It was the most important day to me, while also being
the day that made my heart hurt the most.
